channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: How Trump is remaking one agency to aid his deportation push
item.description: The Trump administration's changes to U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services are taking an axe to the agency's traditional mission of ensuring peop...

item.title: The Fed is expected to cut rates. And, Afghan CIA fighters feel abandoned by the U.S.
item.description: The divided Federal Reserve is considering cutting interest rates today. And, Afghans in the U.S. who fought for the CIA say they feel abandoned by th...

item.title: Useful tips from NPR's most popular self-help stories of the year
item.description: A roundup of good advice from Life Kit's 10 most read stories of 2025. Find out which foods support better sleep, how to be happier and how to graciou...

item.title: Trump's SAVE tool is looking for noncitizen voters. But it's flagging U.S. citizens too
item.description: Anthony Nel, of Texas, became a U.S. citizen as a teen. But a flaw in a Trump administration citizenship tool flagged him as a potential noncitizen, w...

item.title: Border Patrol left Charlotte. The damage stayed behind.
item.description: The Border Patrol's enforcement surge in Charlotte, N.C. lasted just about a week. Residents picking up the pieces in its aftermath say doing so is go...

item.title: Trump vows to make US affordable again, as Americans feel the pinch
item.description: The president says he is focused on "making America affordable again", as cost of living becomes a campaign issue.

item.title: Trump says he'll "make a phone call" to stop Cambodia-Thailand clashes
item.description: President Trump helped end a simmering conflict between Cambodia and Thailand in the summer, but the ceasefire didn't last long.

item.title: Eileen Higgins wins Miami mayoral runoff, breaking 30-year Democratic drought
item.description: Higgins defeated former city manager Emilio Gonzalez with 59% of the vote, pledging to tackle housing affordability, climate resilience, and restore t...

item.title: US could ask foreign tourists for five-year social media history before entry
item.description: The plan would affect people from countries, including the UK, which can fill out a form in lieu of a visa.

item.title: 11/5: CBS Morning News
item.description: Democrats score victories in major races across the nation; U.S. forces strike another alleged drug vessel.

item.title: Possible evidence of 2,100-year-old ceasefire uncovered in Israel
item.description: Archaeologists finished excavating foundations of the ancient wall that surrounded Jerusalem when the story of Hanukkah took place.

item.title: Nobel Peace Prize winner will be in Oslo but won't make awards ceremony
item.description: Venezuelan opposition leader María Corina Machado, who lives in hiding, is reportedly safe and on her way to Oslo.

item.title: Suspect charged with attempted murder of New York Jets player Kris Boyd
item.description: A man has been charged with attempted murder in the shooting of New York Jets player Kris Boyd outside a New York City restaurant in November.

item.title: Gunfire as rebels target key DR Congo city despite Trump peace deal
item.description: Schools and shops remain closed in Uvira amid fears that rebels have seized some administrative buildings.

item.title: At least 22 killed in building collapse in Morocco
item.description: The two four-storey buildings that came down in Fez contained eight families, state media report.

item.title: Justice Department can unseal Ghislaine Maxwell sex trafficking case records, judge says
Illinois law protects immigrants from arrest near courthouses, hospitals or colleges
Opponents of Trump-backed redistricting in Missouri submit a petition to force a public vote
item.description: Opponents of Missouri’s new congressional map have submitted thousands of petition signatures calling for a statewide referendum on the plan backed by...
